remarks: Infer an ordering relation from a proof in only one direction. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2014.)
statement:
ltord.1 $e |- ( x = y -> A = B ) $.
ltord.2 $e |- ( x = C -> A = M ) $.
ltord.3 $e |- ( x = D -> A = N ) $.
ltord.4 $e |- S C_ RR $.
ltord.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. S ) -> A e. RR ) $.
ltord2.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x < y -> B < A ) ) $.
leord2 $p |- ( ( ph /\ ( C e. S /\ D e. S ) ) -> ( C <_ D <-> N <_ M ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d C x y $.
$d D x y $.
$d M x y $.
$d N x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d ph x y $.
